name: strand-loader
description: A fully styled loading graphic with the option for variable messaging. You can override the default spinner graphic by providing your own strand-spinner element.

attributes.name: bgColor
attributes.description: The color of the loader graphic background.

attributes.name: bgOpacity
attributes.description: The opacity of the loader graphic background.

attributes.name: paddingTop
attributes.description: The paddng, in pixels, applied to both top and bottom of the loader graphic.

attributes.name: paddingLeft
attributes.description: The paddng, in pixels, applied to both left and right of the loader graphic.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Instructs the component to show itself and begin animating.

methods.name: hide
methods.description: Instructs the component to hide itself and stop animating.
